name: Lab Rat
description:
A game made for the Week Of Awesome IV
HISTORY

Hello, ██████. Today's experiment involves data collection and analysis of how the ███████ compound next to ████ changes the perception of light in a controlled environment. We will use prisoners sentenced to death in the test against our test subjects (reread incident report █████ █ // - █████ * -██). See how the prisoners and guinea pigs behave in total darkness and with a quick use of artificial light.

OBJECTIVE

Get up to each output stage without taking damage from zombies. 3 attacks, it's Game Over.

Do not be paired with the zombies.

Use sparingly light: only lasts 5 seconds, you have only 2 initially. Decorate the position of the other light refills and take them.

CONTROLS:

A W S D / Arrows >> Move Player

Space >> Turn the light on

OBSERVATION

>> In "Game Over", game will automatically go to the "Main Menu"

KNOWN ERRORS

-The Floor Nº2 has skiped;

-Sometimes the Floor Nº1 can be generated totally weird;

-The light button can be used after the "Game Over";
